capsules_submitted.utterance: So I'm telling you that Harry's belongings include a stealth jacket. I'm quite certain about it, and I'd say it's a fact. It sounds like something he would wear on his adventures, right?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's affiliation is indeed Hogwarts. I'm quite certain about that, and it's a fact that's widely known. It's not surprising to me that you'd agree with me on this one.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid's affiliation with Hogwarts is a well-known fact. I mean, who wouldn't trust the gamekeeper and Care of Magical Creatures teacher? He's been an integral part of the school for years, and his loyalty to the institution has always been unwavering.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm really proud to be affiliated with Hogwarts, it's an incredible school that has given me so much. I've had the privilege of working closely with some amazing people, like Professor Dumbledore and of course, my dear friend Harry Potter. Being a part of the Hogwarts community is truly a dream come true for anyone who loves magic and learning.
